snippet: Speaker John A. Boehner’s blueprint may force President Obama to decide whether to abandon a new path to citizenship and accept other concessions.
abstract: Pres Obama and his allies may soon confront difficult decision of whether to abandon the creation of a new path to citizenship for 11 million illegal immigrants and accept tough border security and enforcement measures that they have long criticized; those are some concessions that Speaker John A Boehner says he will demand in exchange for a Republican willingness to overhaul the immigration system.

byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and ASHLEY PARKER

lead_paragraph: Speaker John A. Boehner’s blueprint may force President Obama to decide whether to abandon a new path to citizenship and accept other concessions.

headline.main: House G.O.P.’s Immigration Plan Presents Tough Choices for Obama
headline.print_headline: House G.O.P.’s Immigration Plan Presents Tough Choices for Obama
